languages.text: "Нет. Ловушка — это то, что я устроил для тебя, неожиданное и утонченное творение изощренного ума. Это — приглашение на резню". {n}Маражай презрительно морщится.{/n} "Караэль даже не скрывал того, насколько Опустошительная буря ненавидит меня".

traits.locale_text: "Разумеется, это ловушка". {n}Маражай презрительно закатывает глаза.{/n} "Роду Эзирраэш суждено вернуться... Караэль — идиот, если считал, что купит меня подобными рассказами. Наш род мыслит... иначе".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "It is not. A trap is what I prepared for you, an unexpected and exquisite creation of a sophisticated mind. This is an invitation to a slaughter." {n}Marazhai's lip curls in contempt.{/n} "Kharael did not even try to hide how much the Reaving Tempest hates me."
languages.original_text: "Нет. Ловушка — это то, что я устроил для тебя, неожиданное и утонченное творение изощренного ума. Это — приглашение на резню". {n}Маражай презрительно морщится.{/n} "Караэль даже не скрывал того, насколько Опустошительная буря ненавидит меня".

traits.locale_text: "It is not. A trap is what I had prepared for you, an unexpected and exquisite creation of a sophisticated mind. This is an invitation to slaughter." {n}Marazhai wrinkles his nose with contempt.{/n} "Kharael did not even try to hide how much the Reaving Tempest hates me."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is not. A trap is what I prepared for you, an unexpected and exquisite creation of a sophisticated mind. This is an invitation to a slaughter." {n}Marazhai's lip curls in contempt.{/n} "Kharael did not even try to hide how much the Reaving Tempest hates me."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Nein. Eine Falle ist, was ich für Euch vorbereitet habe, eine unerwartete und exquisite Erschöpfung eines kultivierten Verstands. Das ist eine Einladung zu einem Gemetzel." {n}Marazhais Lippen kräuseln sich verächtlich.{/n} "Kharael hat nicht einmal versucht, zu verbergen, wie sehr der plündernde Sturm mich hasst."
languages.original_text: "It is not. A trap is what I prepared for you, an unexpected and exquisite creation of a sophisticated mind. This is an invitation to a slaughter." {n}Marazhai's lip curls in contempt.{/n} "Kharael did not even try to hide how much the Reaving Tempest hates me."

traits.locale_text: "Nein. Eine Falle ist, was ich für Euch vorbereitet habe, eine unerwartete und exquisite Erschöpfung eines kultivierten Verstands. Das ist eine Einladung zu einem Gemetzel." {n}Marazhais Lippen kräuseln sich verächtlich.{/n} "Kharael hat nicht einmal versucht, zu verbergen, wie sehr der plündernde Sturm mich hasst."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “并非如此。陷阱是我这样的人为你这样的人准备的，是精明的头脑构想出的巧妙阴谋。至于这个，这是邀请我参加屠杀的邀请函。”{n}玛拉斋轻蔑地扬起了嘴角。{/n}“卡瑞尔甚至都没打算掩饰狂风阴谋团对我多么恨之入骨。”
languages.original_text: "It is not. A trap is what I prepared for you, an unexpected and exquisite creation of a sophisticated mind. This is an invitation to a slaughter." {n}Marazhai's lip curls in contempt.{/n} "Kharael did not even try to hide how much the Reaving Tempest hates me."

traits.locale_text: “并非如此。陷阱是我这样的人为你这样的人准备的，是精明的头脑构想出的巧妙阴谋。至于这个，这是邀请我参加屠杀的邀请函。”{n}玛拉斋轻蔑地扬起了嘴角。{/n}“卡瑞尔甚至都没打算掩饰狂风阴谋团对我多么恨之入骨。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Non. Un piège, c'est ce que j'ai préparé pour vous, le produit insoupçonné et exquis d'un esprit sophistiqué. Ça, c'est un aller simple pour l'abattoir. » {n}Le visage de Marazhai se fend d'un rictus méprisant.{/n} « Kharael n'a même pas tenté de dissimuler la haine que me voue la Tempête ravageuse. »
languages.original_text: "It is not. A trap is what I prepared for you, an unexpected and exquisite creation of a sophisticated mind. This is an invitation to a slaughter." {n}Marazhai's lip curls in contempt.{/n} "Kharael did not even try to hide how much the Reaving Tempest hates me."

traits.locale_text: « Non. Un piège, c'est ce que j'ai préparé pour vous, le produit insoupçonné et exquis d'un esprit sophistiqué. Ça, c'est un aller simple pour l'abattoir. » {n}Le visage de Marazhai se fend d'un rictus méprisant.{/n} « Kharael n'a même pas tenté de dissimuler la haine que me voue la Tempête ravageuse. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «No lo es. Trampa es lo que preparé para ti, una creación sorprendente y exquisita por parte de una mente sofisticada. Esto es una invitación a una masacre». {n}Marazhai hace una mueca despectiva.{/n} «Kharael ni siquiera ha intentado ocultar lo mucho que me odia la Tempestad Asoladora».
languages.original_text: "It is not. A trap is what I prepared for you, an unexpected and exquisite creation of a sophisticated mind. This is an invitation to a slaughter." {n}Marazhai's lip curls in contempt.{/n} "Kharael did not even try to hide how much the Reaving Tempest hates me."

traits.locale_text: «No lo es. Trampa es lo que preparé para ti, una creación sorprendente y exquisita por parte de una mente sofisticada. Esto es una invitación a una masacre». {n}Marazhai hace una mueca despectiva.{/n} «Kharael ni siquiera ha intentado ocultar lo mucho que me odia la Tempestad Asoladora».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「いいや。罠は俺様がお前に仕掛けたんだ。洗練された精神が作り出す予測不可能で極めて精巧な作品。これは虐殺への招待状だ」{n}マラズハイの唇がさげすむかのようにゆがむ。{/n}「カラエルは略奪の嵐がどれだけ俺を嫌っているのか、隠そうともしなかった」
languages.original_text: "It is not. A trap is what I prepared for you, an unexpected and exquisite creation of a sophisticated mind. This is an invitation to a slaughter." {n}Marazhai's lip curls in contempt.{/n} "Kharael did not even try to hide how much the Reaving Tempest hates me."

traits.locale_text: 「いいや。罠は俺様がお前に仕掛けたんだ。洗練された精神が作り出す予測不可能で極めて精巧な作品。これは虐殺への招待状だ」{n}マラズハイの唇がさげすむかのようにゆがむ。{/n}「カラエルは略奪の嵐がどれだけ俺を嫌っているのか、隠そうともしなかった」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Değil. Tuzak, benim sana hazırladığım gibi beklenmedik ve sofistike bir zihinden çıktığı belli olan, seçkin bir yaratım olur. Bu bir katliam daveti." {n}Marazhai'ın dudakları horgörüyle kıvrılıyor.{/n} "Kharael, Müfteris Kasırga'nın benden ne kadar nefret ettiğini gizlemeye çalışmadı bile."
languages.original_text: "It is not. A trap is what I prepared for you, an unexpected and exquisite creation of a sophisticated mind. This is an invitation to a slaughter." {n}Marazhai's lip curls in contempt.{/n} "Kharael did not even try to hide how much the Reaving Tempest hates me."

traits.locale_text: "Değil. Tuzak benim sana hazırladığım gibi beklenmedik ve sofistike bir zihinden çıktığı belli olan, seçkin bir yaratım olur. Bu bir katliam daveti." {n}Marazhai'ın dudakları horgörüyle kıvrılıyor.{/n} "Kharael, Müfteris Kasırga'nın benden ne kadar nefret ettiğini gizlemeye bile çalışmadı."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
